## General Information
1.0 km2 reservoir in North Dakota.  Maximum depth of 18 feet near dam per bathymetry.  Nice boat ramp at NE side of lake.

## Index Site
U-01 is nearest the dam, but also close to shoreline.  U-13 might be deeper.  Use whichever is deepest.
